2.name: Scout
2.desc:
Markers placed on the map will generate radar scans every #Ds. 
 Reduces range at which enemies can detect the wearer by #I%.

3.name: Fortified
3.desc:
Further Reduces recoil when crouching or prone by #I%. 
 Provides #I% resistance to explosive damage.

6.name: Engineering Kit
6.desc:
Further Reduces recoil when crouching or prone by #I%. 
 Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of grenades by +#I.

7.name: Med-Kit
7.desc:
Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of stims by +#I. 
 Increases stim effect duration by #Ds.

8.name: Servo-Assisted
8.desc:
Increases throwing range by #I%. 
 Provides +#I% limb health.

9.name: Democracy Protects
9.desc:
#I% chance to not die when taking lethal damage. 
 Prevents all damage from bleeding if chest hemorrhages.
